pages.text: This portal can only be lit in the overworld, and will take the player to the End to begin the first boss fight.$(br)This portal is made from "Original Stratospherical End Portal Frames"

pages.name: End Portal
pages.text: This portal frame must be lit using the $(item)"Stratified Stone Tablet"
In the overworld simply use the vanilla nether portal to reach the OG Stratospherical Nether.
This portal can only be lit in the Stratospherical Dimension, and will take the player back to the Overworld.$(br)This portal is made from "Original Stratospherical Portal Frames"

pages.name: Return Portal
pages.text: This portal frame must be lit using the $(item)"Red Dragon Essence"
